Review Text: This is cute. To me it gives the look of "threw my hair up to run to the store". Or just a quick updo. I guess you could dress it up with the hoop earrings it came with...But it's cute! The hair does have a slightly synthetic look to it...but it is synthetic, so what do you expect?
Review Title: Cute
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Women's Pleated Scarves Pashmina Shawl Wraps for Wedding Bride Bridesmaid Gifts (Black) HOMELEX {'Package Dimensions': '12 x 10.7 x 0.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'UPC': '782903598692'} So happy I added this to my headscarf collection. I got the black one but am definitely eyeing up the champagne, brown, and yellow! The fabric is so soft and I love the pleated design. It's pretty long, which allows so many styles to be worn! It could even work as a scarf around your neck! Very versatile. Beautiful & Versatile Laloirelle Age Defy Face Oil - Virgin Marula Oil, Rosehip Oil Infused with Organic Reishi Mushroom, Ginseng, Cordyceps Mushroom - Organic Facial Oil for Anti Aging, Wrinkles, Acne Scars, Dry Skin (1oz) Laloirelle {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.4 x 2.32 inches; 4.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AD30'} I'm a fan of this face oil. I find that I can only really use it as part of my nighttime skincare routine, as the finish is...well...oily. I have another face oil that I use in the morning that has more of a matte finish so I'm not shining all throughout the day. That being said, this oil is not bad. It just leaves you very shiny!

It has a great floral smell and just 2-3 drops is enough to cover your face/neck. Dewy Moisturizing Finish Laloirelle Luminous Face Oil - Organic Pomegranate Oil, Cacao Oil Infused W/Brightening White Peony Root, Marigold Flower, Lotus Leaf - Glowing Skin That Feels Hydrated, Plump and Firm - 1.0 fl oz Laloirelle {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Scent': 'Pomegranate', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.55 Ounces'} Oof! I just can't get over the smell of this one. It could be a scent that others may find pleasurable, but not me. I can't find a specific smell it reminds me of...but think a deep nutty smell mixed with the smell of old leather? The scent dissipates a bit after you rub it into your skin, but it lingers just enough to bother me. But if you are a fan of those deep, woodsy, older scents, this might be for you.

I will say, it soaks extremely well into the skin, leaving you with a really nice matte finish that most other oils aren't capable of. Scent Is Not For Me Laloirelle Age Renewal Serum - Phyto-Biotics Stem Cells, Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Retinol, Multi-Vitamin, Herbal Infusion - Organic serum for anti-aging, hydration, wrinkles, all skin types (1oz) Laloirelle {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.73 Ounces'} I'm so impressed by this natural serum. From the ingredients ... to the consistency & coverage. My skin soaks this right up in my nighttime skincare routine. The scent is amazing with bright floral notes. It's a win for me. Smells Amazing / Great Ingredients MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD {'Brand': 'JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '25.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 7.87 x 1.97 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '685757511926'} These are okay. They are definitely not heavy duty enough if you wear a lot of makeup. I occasionally throw on a little concealer or foundation before remote meetings on ZOOM, so these wipes work for me. However it still takes me about 4 wipes to get that small amount of makeup off.

I don't mind the scent, but I don't love it either.
Overall, I wouldn't brag about these wipes or go out of my way to recommend them, they're just okay. Not The Worst...Not The Best Short Afro Kinky Curly Headband Wig Ombre Wigs Headband Wig Head Wrap Wigs 2 in 1 Headband Wigs Mix Orange Turban Afro High Puff Wigs Synthetic Scarf Wigs INSTASTYLE {'Material': 'High Temperature Fiber', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Kinky', 'Style': 'Chic', 'Brand': 'INSTASTYLE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult'} This is cute. To me it gives the look of "threw my hair up to run to the store". Or just a quick updo. I guess you could dress it up with the hoop earrings it came with...But it's cute! The hair does have a slightly synthetic look to it...but it is synthetic, so what do you expect? Cute
profile:
**User Summary:**

The user continues to showcase a strong affinity for versatile accessories and skincare products that elevate both comfort and style. Their commitment to elegance alongside practicality is reflected in their preference for high-quality, soft fabrics in women's fashion, as they explore a variety of colors and aesthetics.

Recently, they integrated a natural serum into their nighttime skincare routine, highlighting their appreciation for multifunctional products with delightful sensory experiences. Their critical approach to product selection is further evidenced by their assessment of makeup remover wipes as merely adequate for their needs, indicating a desire for effectiveness in their skincare regimen.

Their latest purchase reveals an interest in chic, convenient hairstyles, as they selected a headband wig that offers both a playful and practical option for daily wear. They noted its ease of use in creating a casual, yet stylish look, and while acknowledging its synthetic nature, they embraced its aesthetic appeal. 

Overall, the user's preferences lean toward elegant yet practical items that enhance their aesthetic while prioritizing quality. Their holistic approach to beauty and personal expression continues to reflect a balance of practicality and aesthetic detail, navigating between varying product effectiveness and sensory enjoyment in their evolving lifestyle.
